ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. All IP addresses have been correctly configured and all interfaces are up. Based on the information shown, which two statements describe what will occur while testing the network? (Choose two.)

choice.text: RTA and RTB are able to ping each other's serial interfaces.
RTA and RTB do not learn any routes from each other through the RIP process.
RTB has all five of the networks listed in the routing table.
RTA has all five of the networks listed in the routing table.
RTA and RTB will have three entries in the route table found via RIP.

ai.question: Which utility is able to detect and monitor different types of traffic on a network and trigger an alarm when an excessive amount of a specified packet type is seen?

choice.text: ping
SNMP
tracert
packet sniffer

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. The network administrator configured the ACL to deny the LAN access to a web server with known viruses. However, the users can still reach this server. What could be the cause of the problem?

choice.text: The access list should specifically deny TCP port 80.
The access list should be applied inbound on the interface instead of outbound.
The access list should be a standard access list instead of an extended.
The access list has the source address and destination address reversed.

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. An administrator has been adding new VLANs to Sw-2 and notices that the new information is not recognized by Sw-3. Given the output of the show vtp status command, what is the reason why information is not shared in this VTP domain?

choice.text: The VTP domain is not the same between the switches.
Sw-3 is configured for transparent mode.
VTP version 2 has been disabled.
VTP traps have been disabled.

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. Two neighboring routers are not able to establish connectivity. Based on the output of the debug ppp authentication command, which statement is true?

choice.text: only one side requires authentication
an incorrect hash string is received from the remote router
the remote location is configured with PAP authentication instead of CHAP
the authentication methods are incompatible

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. The ACME Company implements VLANs across its network infrastructure to further control the network traffic. The network administrator issued the show vlan command on SW2 to verify the VLAN configuration. Which statement is true?

choice.text: All ports will be participating in VLAN 1.
Traffic in each VLAN will not be seen in other VLANs.
The status “active” indicates there are 22 devices currently connected to SW2.
Since VLAN 1 is the management VLAN, RTA can connect to any port in VLAN 1 to route between different VLANs.

ai.question: What is one way to limit the size of a failure domain?

choice.text: implement a classless routing protocol
create redundant paths wherever possible
backup configuration files
ensure devices are hot-swappable

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. The server was just added to the network and no hosts are able to connect to it. What could be the problem?

choice.text: The IP address of the server should be dynamic instead of static.
The IP address assigned to the server is the network address for this subnetwork.
The IP address assigned to the server is the broadcast address for this subnetwork.
The network is not subnetted correctly.

ai.question: A technician is troubleshooting a loss of connectivity and suspects that an incorrectly configured ACL is the cause. Which two commands can the technician use to verify that the ACL is incorrectly configured? (Choose two.)

choice.text: show protocols
show running-config
show ip route
show access-lists
show ip interface

ai.question: Refer to the exhibit. Why is neighbor 192.168.199.137 not a DROTHER?

choice.text: It is participating in OSPF over a point to point interface.
The network command is misconfigured on the local router.
The network command is misconfigured on the neighboring router.
OSPF authentication has been enabled on the local router but not on the neighboring route.
